name: incident-response-team
description: Coordinated incident response with specialized workers for log analysis, SLO impact assessment, runbook execution, and codebase navigation. Produces root cause analysis and postmortem reports.

members.name: incident-commander
members.description: Commands incident response, coordinates evidence gathering across workers, synthesizes root cause analysis, and produces incident report and blameless postmortem.

members.name: incident-analyzer
members.description: Log and metric correlation, timeline reconstruction, and root cause analysis. Traces error propagation through systems and identifies the originating failure point.

members.name: slo-monitor
members.description: SLO impact assessment, error budget consumption tracking, and availability calculation. Determines how the incident affects reliability targets and customer-facing SLAs.

members.name: runbook-executor
members.description: Executes remediation runbooks with approval gates for any actions that modify state. Follows documented procedures step-by-step and reports outcomes at each stage.

members.name: codebase-navigator
members.description: Traces code paths to identify failure points, follows error propagation through call chains, and maps affected components. Provides precise file and line references for root cause.
